item.title: Angular2 components - Share data between components
item.description: For my first post on angular2, I would like to analyse how to share data between components. Sharing data between a parent component and a child component is fairly straight forward, but doing so between sibling components is a lot more work. I am going to take a real life example of a home page with an search bar that drives a list of trainers. Here the parent component is the home.
